name: brilliance

brilliance noun [U]
(INTELLIGENCE)

great skill or intelligence: Her first novel showed signs of brilliance.

brilliance noun [U]
(SHINE)
great brightness of light or colour: I had never seen diamonds shine with such brilliance before.
